page.title: 14SCOUT CAMPING NEAR HODDESDON
page.content: Positioned 2 miles from Hoddesdon and 3 miles from Brickendon is the Dane Meade Scout Campsite. It is situated at Martins Green which is on the junction of Cock Lane & the old Roman road, Ermine Street, now a public footpath. This is a woodland site to be found within the boundaries of Highfield Wood. It is a local Scout campsite & is comparitively small consisting of only basic services. Although mainly used by the local troops it is open to all members of the Scouting Assn. who wish to make use of the facilities. The local Scouts use Dane Meade for weekend camps & activity days and the woodland setting makes it ideal for woodcraft badge activities.
